  • Uses of Transaction in com.paymybuddy.ewallet.controller

    Methods in com.paymybuddy.ewallet.controller that return types with arguments of type Transaction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Transaction>
    TransactionController.addEwalletTransaction(EwalletTransactionAddDto ewalletTransactionAddDto)
    A PostMapping method on the /ewallet URI with a DTO, consisting of the active user id and the amount of the e-wallet credit or debit, as RequestBody.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Transaction>
    TransactionController.addTransaction(TransactionAddDto transactionAddDto)
    A PostMapping method on the /transaction URI with a DTO, consisting of the active user id, the receiver (as DTO) the amount and the comment of the transaction, as RequestBody.
    List<Transaction>
    TransactionController.getTransactions(String sortBy, String order)
    A GetMapping method on the /transactions URI with two optional RequestParams for sorting and ordering the lists returned.
    List<Transaction>
    TransactionController.getTransactionsBetweenUsers(int firstUserId, int secondUserId, String sortBy, String order)
    A GetMapping method on the /history/between URI with two user id as PathVariable and two optional RequestParams for sorting and ordering the lists returned.
    List<Transaction>
    TransactionController.getTransactionsByUser(int userId, String sortBy, String order)
    A GetMapping method on the /history URI with an user id as PathVariable and two optional RequestParams for sorting and ordering the lists returned.
    List<Transaction>
    TransactionController.getTransactionsFromEwallet(int userId)
    A GetMapping method on the /history/ewallet URI with an user id as PathVariable.
